name: undanceable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of a piece of music) impossible to dance to: If you listen to our records, you'll find that there's dance music, but there are also some very beautiful, undanceable songs, too. The piece of music which she uses for the final section of the show is undanceable.
More examplesFewer examplesThe song seemed to be undanceable, because it kept crossing over from the on to the off beat.She put on a tune that was undanceable, just to clear the dance floor and start again from zero.Part of the song may actually be undanceable, when there are breaks in the music where there is no audible sound or rhythm at all.
